description: Users may observe noticeable performance issues with the Outlook application, specifically the desktop client and Outlook on the web. This manifests as increased system resource usage, which can cause the client to freeze or crash. The problem affects all connection methods for Outlook, highlighting a widespread concern. Although remediation measures have been implemented, users must take specific actions to ensure full resolution, such as restarting the application or clearing their browser cache for web access. Continuous monitoring and user feedback indicate that the implemented fixes are effective, but users are advised to follow the guidance provided in the communication to mitigate the problem completely.
